values: 传统；遗留；遗留问题；历史遗产；遗赠物；遗产（法律上指死者留给继承人的财产）
过时的但广泛使用的；传统的但仍被采用的；（计算机系统或产品）已停产的

sample.mean: n. 拥护；提倡；主张；律师职业

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状态

word_group.brief_definition: 指明账户遗赠；指定遗赠

bilingual.target: 这位继承者将继续他的遗产。

bilingual.source: The traditions are a legacy of our ancestors.
bilingual.target: 这些传统是我们祖先的遗产。

bilingual.source: She received a legacy from her grandmother.
bilingual.target: 她从祖母那里继承了一笔遗产。

bilingual.source: Historians often debate the legacy of Peron.
bilingual.target: 历史学家经常争论佩隆的遗产。

bilingual.source: Many historians debate the legacy of Truman.
bilingual.target: 许多历史学家争论杜鲁门的遗产。

bilingual.source: His legacy will everlast for generations to come.
bilingual.target: 他的遗产将持久地传承给后代。

bilingual.source: The old building is a legacy of the colonial era.
bilingual.target: 这座老建筑是殖民时代的遗产。

bilingual.source: The legacy of Franco still affects Spain today.
bilingual.target: 弗朗哥的遗产至今仍影响着西班牙。

bilingual.source: His artistic works are his legacy to the world.
bilingual.target: 他的艺术作品是他留给世界的遗产。

bilingual.source: The museum showcases the cultural legacy of the region.
bilingual.target: 博物馆展示了该地区的文化遗产。

list.abstract: legacy（英 [ˈleɡəsi]，美 [ˈleɡəsi]），英语单词，作名词为遗产；由先人留传下来的东西。作形容词为已过时但因使用范围广而难以替代的。例句：The legacy of centuries of neglect.（几百年的疏忽所造成的后果。）。 近义词有heritage。

名词n. [C]
1. 遗产；遗赠
His uncle left him a legacy of $50,000.
他叔父给他留下五万元遗产。
2. 留给后人的东西
Books are the legacies that a great genius leaves to mankind.
书是伟大的天才留给人类的精神财富。
形容词a.
【电脑】（用于过时的软件或硬件产生的数据等）遗留下来又难以更新的; 老化的

yingyinNormal.en: Shao Lin's legacy is monastic dedication and focus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 少林的遗产是奉献和专注。

yingyinNormal.en: My legacy? You don't like this place very much, do you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的遗产？你不是很喜欢这个地方，对吗？

yingyinNormal.en: We're simply concerned about the extent of the changes you're making. We want to protect your legacy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们只是担心你即将带来的改变程度过大，我们想保护你的遗产。

yingyinNormal.en: And as we showed the world this week, we are prepared to do what is necessary, to secure that legacy for generations to come.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正如本周我们展现给世界的，我们已经准备好做必要的事情，为了后代子孙保卫这一遗产。

yingyinNormal.en: The people of the world look to us to lead. And we welcome that responsibility. We are heirs to a proud legacy of freedom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 世界人民关注着我们的领导力量，我们欢迎这样的责任心，我们是自由这一引以自豪遗产的继承人。

yingyinNormal.en: And if America Works succeeds, then whoever you choose to run in 2016 not only has the backing of a united party, but a formidable legacy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果美国就业法案成功了，那不管16年谁来竞选都会有全党的支持，更会有一笔可贵的遗产。

yingyinNormal.en: That carol is still much-loved today, a legacy of the Christmas truce, and a reminder to us all that even in the unlikeliest of places hope can still be found.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那首颂歌仍然是人们最爱的旋律之一，作为圣诞休战的宝贵遗产，它提醒我们，哪怕刀山火海，希望永在。

yingyinNormal.en: Defeated in battle. Is this to be my legacy?
yingyinNormal.zh: "在战斗中被击败"，这就是我的遗赠？

yingyinNormal.en: Another legacy of England's monarchy are the Royal Parks of London.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而伦敦皇家公园则是另一个英格兰皇室遗留下来的景点。

yingyinNormal.en: I will not be a placeholder president, Claire. I will win. And I will leave a legacy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会只当个填座总统的，克莱尔，我一定会赢，我会名垂青史。

yingyinNormal.en: They're cars, not carriages. It's a legacy of the early American involvement in the Tube system.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那叫车，不叫车厢，美国早期地铁系统留下的旧称。

yingyinNormal.en: Not all of it. Our friend was an early model. The old hosts used a legacy geopositioning system.
yingyinNormal.zh: 并没有全部被清除，这家伙是个老款的老接待员，采用的都是传承地理定位系统。

yingyinNormal.en: But truly, what more could she desire? Together, they rule an empire without heirs. Legacy is their only child.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是说真的，她还能渴求什么呢？他们一起统治一个帝国，没有子嗣。遗志是他们唯一的孩子。

yingyinNormal.en: You loved it so much that you couldn't even make a deal or move a single thing forward. You have a legacy of nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你太喜欢了以至于你甚至不能达成一笔协议或者推进一件事。你什么也没有留下。

yingyinNormal.en: You could say I'm here to honor his legacy. And I think your tattoo is the next piece of the puzzle. So, do we have a wager?
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以说我来这里是为了尊崇他的遗志，我认为你身上的纹身是谜局的下一部分，你愿意赌吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Criminals are like weeds, Alfred. Pull one up, another grows in its place. This is about the future of the world. This is my legacy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 犯罪就像野草，阿尔弗雷德。野火烧不尽，春风吹又生，这关系到世界的未来，这是我的遗赠。

yingyinNormal.en: The intelligence has been passed on to the relevant authorities. Our work is complete. And a most distinguished legacy for our fallen friend it is too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这份情报已经移交给相关部门了。我们的工作完成了。这亦是我们逝去的朋友的最崇高的遗赠了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (产品/系统/软件)遗留的; 老旧的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: (产品/系统/软件)遗留的; 老旧的

examination_example.sentence: I would raise prices and make it into more of a <highlight>legacy</highlight> product.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我会提高价格，让它成为传统产品。

examination_example.sentence: It's a really hard thing to do and it's a tremendous luxury that BuzzFeed doesn't have a <highlight>legacy</highlight> business.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这真是一件非常棘手的事情，BuzzFeed竟然没有这样的传统业务，也是非常奢侈的。

sense_info_list.en: an amount of money or property left to someone in a will

examination_example.sentence: Parkrun is succeeding where London's Olympic "<highlight>legacy</highlight>" is failing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “Parkrun”在伦敦奥运“遗产”失败之处取得了成效。

examination_example.sentence: The great <highlight>legacy</highlight> of the Games would be to lever a nation of sport lovers away from their couches.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奥运会的伟大遗产将是把整个国家的体育爱好者从沙发上拉起来。

sense_info_list.en: a direct result of it and which continues to exist after it is over

sample.mean: n. 拥护；提倡；主张；律师职业

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 性质, 状态

word_usage.usage: legacy作名词还表示“（事件或历史的）遗留问题，后遗症”，如：to overcome the legacy of inequality and injustice 消除遗留的不平等与不公正问题。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an amount of money or property left to someone in a will

examination_example.sentence: A hidden hazard of digitally recreating a deceased (已故的) celebrity is the risk of damaging their <highlight>legacy</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数字化再现已故名人的一个隐患是有可能破坏他们的遗产。

examination_example.sentence: And what is in the best interest of a deceased person's <highlight>legacy</highlight> may conflict with the desires of their family or the public, says Edwards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 爱德华兹说，符合死者遗产最大利益的东西可能会与他们的家人或公众的愿望相冲突。

examination_example.sentence: The technology's ability to effectively keep celebrities alive beyond the grave is raising questions about public <highlight>legacies</highlight> and image rights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项技术能够有效地让名人死后继续活着，这引发了关于公共遗产和肖像权的问题。

sense_info_list.en: a direct result of it and which continues to exist after it is over

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps my expectations of caring, deep-and-meaningful conversations were a <highlight>legacy</highlight> of the last time I was in that kind of office environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我对那些关心他人、深入而有意义的交谈依旧十分期待。这也许是我在之前的办公环境下养成的习惯，遗留下来的。

sample.mean: n. 拥护；提倡；主张；律师职业
